name: linter-pylint
description: Lint python on the fly, using pylint

executablePath.description: Command or full path to pylint. Use %p for current project directory (no trailing /) or %h for current project name.

pythonPath.description: Paths to be added to $PYTHONPATH. Use %p for current project directory or %f for the directory of the current file.

rcFile.description: Path to pylintrc file. Use %p for the current project directory or %f for the directory of the current file.

workingDirectory.description: Directory pylint is run from. Use %p for the current project directory or %f for the directory of the current file.

messageFormat.description: Format for Pylint messages where %m is the message, %i is the numeric mesasge ID (e.g. W0613) and %s is the human-readable message ID (e.g. unused-argument).

disableTimeout.title: Disable Execution Timeout
disableTimeout.description: By default processes running longer than 10 seconds will be automatically terminated. Enable this option if you are getting messages about process execution timing out.
